# The pre-commit framework works on developers' machines, but it can be easily bypassed
# (for example, when editing directly through the GitHub UI). Thatâ€™s why we enforce
# it in the CI process as an additional safeguard.

name: pre-commit

on:
  pull_request:
  push:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  pre-commit:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v3
    - uses: actions/setup-python@v3
    - uses: pre-commit/action@v3.0.1
